One of our several items for discussion in Ann Arbor would
be the question of when future meetings should be scheduled. As
I recall it* one of Scott Fletcher*s original ideas was that this
committee would meet* among other times, just prior to Center Board
meetings* to make proposals to the President for consideration by
the Board. This may or may not be feasible as things have developed
in the Center, but this is at least one of the possibilities we
might consider. In any event, when we do meet, I suggest the
committee convene for a day or so by itself, and subsequently
conferring with you and other members of the Center. In that way
we could organize a presentation which would be more helpful to
you, and also could better react to your questions and proposals
to us
Hay I hear from you at your convenience? X want to make the
ETRC-NAEB relationships as close and mutually helpful as possible.
With best personal regards,
Yours sincerely,
Burton Paulu
